channel.title: Jdbc
channel.description: I'm looking to use Databases with Java, mainly SQLite and MySQL (because flat files suk). I am looking for the jdbc drivers in [b]pure java[/b], because I want this to work on all platforms, and binaries aren't good enough.

item.title: Jdbc
item.dc:creator: @RLN RLN
item.description:
@RLN wrote:

If you want to keep scalability in mind you’d be stupid to not use a database imo… but for static data obviously not the best approach

Read full topic

item.title: Jdbc
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:4, topic:385311”]in a lot of cases flat files are more suitable than relational databases. though the only reason there are a lot of cases where its better is because nubs just use databases for everything related to data storage[/quote]This, which is why i gave OP a question back.

Read full topic
